name: ChainPunk
description:
Made for United Game Jam 2020!

PLAY ALONE OR WITH A FRIEND! CONTROLLER RECOMMENDED!

****CONTROLS****

Controller:

Move Blue: Left Stick

Move Red: Right Stick

Punch Blue: L1

Punch Red: R1

Restart: Square or X

Keyboard:

Move Blue: WASD

Move Red: IJKL or arrow keys

Punch Blue: E

Punch Red: U or /

Restart: R

******************

Two prisoners must use their fire and ice powers to beat the hell out of robots, guards and inmates to escape. But there is a more sinister otherworldly being that lurks within the dungeon. Can you fight your way out?

This game was made for the 2020 United Game Jam and fits the theme of "two" because you control two characters tied together by a chain

Check out our long-term project Kaeru:

Environment assets:

RF Castle: https://szadiart.itch.io/rogue-fantasy-castle
